name: BlueMatter
subtitle: A source for qBitConnect, and other apps from RajnishOne
description: Welcome to my source! Here you'll find qBitConnect, and my other future apps.

apps.name: qBitConnect
apps.subtitle: Modern qBittorrent remote client.
apps.localizedDescription:
qBitConnect is a modern, cross-platform remote client for managing your qBittorrent downloads on iOS devices.

Key Features:

• Add torrents via magnet links or files
• Browse and manage torrent files
• Real-time download progress monitoring
• Control your torrents from anywhere
• Multiple theme options (Light, Dark, OLED)
• Advanced filtering and sorting
• Batch operations for multiple torrents
• Detailed statistics and graphs
• Beautiful native iOS interface built with Flutter

versions.localizedDescription: This release includes: • Minor improvements and bug fixes

privacy.name: LocalNetwork
privacy.usageDescription: This app needs access to your local network to connect to qBittorrent servers on your network.
